message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer you a price of $110 for it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $107.50.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105 again?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $105. I'll try to find a middle ground again. I'll counteroffer at $108.
I'm still a bit above my budget, Alice. Would you be willing to go down to $106?
I'm not willing to go as low as $106, Bob. I'll try to find another middle ground. I'll counteroffer at $109.
I'm getting close to my budget limit, Alice. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
I'm not willing to meet you at $108, Bob. I'll try to find another compromise. I'll counteroffer at $110.50.
I'm really close to my budget limit, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $109, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
